title: Boxing Day
story: In all the chaos of the delivery, the gift labels were forgotten – which gift is for whom? The #4 #gifts each have a content from the wish list, and you must guess which one it is.
shortstory: The gifts were mixed up? I wonder what's inside?
content: You can lift, shake, turn and rotate the gifts, but not open them.
points: Enter your answer (number) from the wish list in the #field with the gift number.
location: First Floor – Foyer at the Christmas Tree
